manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

products.manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

summary: I CALLED ISUZU CONCERNING RECALL NUMBER 02I002000 CONCERNING THE ABS ON THE 1998 ISUZU RODEO.  I WAS INFORMED THAT ISUZU CANNOT SEND LETTERS CONCERNING RECALL BECAUSE THE GOVERNMENT WOULD NOT ALLOW IT YET. I CALLED NHTSA AND WAS GIVEN A NUMBER(1-800-959-3993)  THIS NUMBER HAD BEEN CHANGED TO 1-800-726-2700.  I WAS TOLD BY THIS ISUZU DEPARTMENT THAT I NEEDED TO CALL CUSTOMER RELATIONS  AT 1-800-255-6727, WHICH IS WHERE I STARTED!!!
